data.name: Super CosmoJet Demo
data.detailed_description:
This demo version of Super CosmoJet includes the tutorial and the first star system from the full game.

Enjoy!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated / Dedicated GPU
  • Storage: 41 MB available space
